title: Tvvo royall entertainments, lately giuen to the most illustrious Prince Charles, Prince of Great Britaine, by the high and mighty Philip the fourth King of Spaine, &c. At the feasts of Easter and Pentecost. Translated out of the Spanish originals printed at Madrid.
author: Almansa y Mendoza, Andres, 17th cent.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by John Haviland] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at the Pide Bull neere Saint Austins Gate,
